entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
